DOC.brief_summary: This single-center , double-blind , randomize , cross-over Phase 1 study normal , healthy volunteer . Study treatment entail single dos two different formulation MNTX tablet .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics Bioavailability Comparison Two Different Formulations MNTX Tablets
